div.data-ibx-options: {'movable':true, moveHandle:'.map-layer-box', 'modal': false, 'autoClose': false, autoPosition: false, 'destroyOnClose': false, 'position':{'my': 'left+10 top+75', 'at':'left top', 'of':'.map-container'}}

div.class: btndiscover disc_button disc_button-wb esri-widget--button esri-widget esri-interactive
div.title: @ibxString('mlmap.discover')

div.class: btnlocate disc_button disc_button-wb esri-widget--button esri-widget esri-interactive
div.title: @ibxString('mlmap.locate')

div.class: btncDirections disc_button disc_button-wb esri-widget--button esri-widget esri-interactive esri-icon-directions
div.title: @ibxString('mlmap.direction')

div.class: btnclear disc_button disc_button-wb esri-widget--button esri-widget esri-interactive
div.title: @ibxString('mlmap.ClearSel')

div.data-ibx-options: {'movable':true, moveHandle:'.map-tools-box-header', 'modal': false, 'autoClose': false, autoPosition: false, 'destroyOnClose': false, 'position':{'my': 'left+10 top+75', 'at':'left top', 'of':'.map-container'}}
